name: The Frentillon Exam
description: You are you? Really? Nobody's ever taken a good look at themselves and wondered what makes them special. Welcome to The Frentillon Exam. You give me a few minutes of your time and you'll discover who you are without even getting some computer to tell you for you. With simple questions, some physical activity, and a nice simplistic layout, The Frentillon Exam will be the best 15 or so minutes of your life.
